description: Contains the gene annotations assigned to a WGS assembly.

checksums.description: One or more checksums used to ensure file integrity.

date.description: Date on which the annotations were generated.

format.description: The file format of the annotation file.

format_doc.description: URL for documentation of file format.

orf_process.description: The software and version used to generate gene predictions.

sop.description: URL for documentation of procedures used in annotation of genomic/metagenomic assembly.

annotation_pipeline.description: The software and version used to generate annotation.

annotation_source.description: Databases uitlized for providing curation; or for cases where annotation was provided by a community jamboree or model organism database.

study.description: One of the 3 studies that are part of the iHMP.

tags.description: An array of descriptive strings to make the node 'taggable'.

urls.description: An array of URL from where the file can be obtained, http, ftp, fasp, etc...
